attributes.review: I downloaded this app because it was supposed to “make America great again” and sadly it made America worse 😔 the cops who murdered breonna Taylor still have not been arrested. If you want to make America great again DO NOT DOWNLOAD THE APP
attributes.title: False advertising

attributes.review: The app doesn’t work well at all. It hasn’t worked for the last 4 years, and I’m sick of people saying that they love the app and they want to keep it on their phone for 4 more.
attributes.title: Poorly done

attributes.review: I was so excited to get this app but when I downloaded it, it came to life and pushed me down the stairs!! It also burned my house down and murdered my family! Disappointed
attributes.title: This app pushed me down the stairs!!!!!

attributes.review:
I wanted to educate myself on our presidential candidate. Instead I was met with 🍊 nudes. Sexism, racism and bigotry. This app caused me to have to wash my eyes with holy water. It’s disgusting and offensive. 
1/10 would recommend. Terrible time. Big disgrace. I’ll have nightmares for weeks. Thanks 🍊.

I opened the app and to my surprise, a murder hornet spawned out of my phone. Then, it started talking to me and how the world is ending. So it might as well kill me NOWWWWWWW. I WAS TRAUMATIZED. I was SCREAMINGGG AT IT TO GET AWAY AND TRIED TO SMUSH IT WITH MY FEET. But anyways I ran away and almost died so now I’m in a different country 🥰. This app almost killed me 😡
attributes.title: I ALMOST DIEDDDDDD

attributes.review: This app constantly would give me notifications that i was being deported. It would also show a scary picture of a orange oompa loompa with a orange wig. I had nightmares for a week from that picture.
attributes.title: Horrible app

attributes.review: I opened the app and immediately pooped my pants when I saw the terrifying monster on the cover!!!! Do not get this app it will scare you!! I don’t know why they’d add a jump scare in when you open the app!! 0/10 very ugly very useless app
attributes.title: Ugly✨

attributes.review: When it’s downloaded you have to sign in with a phone number and if you don’t have a phone number you have to look at the orange himself and it’s ✨terrible✨
attributes.title: Just gross

attributes.review: this app made my phone freeze up to the point where it wouldn't even turn OFF!! once i got it to turn off it glitched like crazy and could barely delete it before it glitched again. DONT BUY THE APP
attributes.title: ABSOLUTELY AWFUL APP

attributes.review: I think I was gonna get actually good updates but apparently trump is an awful president still on this app. It’s crazy because when I downloaded this app my phone said I got a virus.
attributes.title: The worst
